entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 7:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: SSE 20 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
